channel.title: Would this work foor pi?
channel.description:
ok trying to get christmas cracker working to give random colour p hat to either player randomly.
pi 317
here are codes
[code]/*case 14: //Use something on another player junk = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); //only needed to get the cracker slot ! (remove = server crash !) junk2 = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndianA(); //only needed to get the cracker slot ! (remove = server crash !) junk3 = inStream.readUnsignedWordA(); //only needed to get the cracker slot ! (remove = server crash !) int CrackerSlot = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian(); int CrackerID = playerItems[CrackerSlot]; CrackerID -= 1; //Only to fix the ID ! if (CrackerID == 962) { sendMessage("You crack the cracker..."); int UsedOn = (int)(misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 3, 1) / 1000); PlayerHandler.players[UsedOn].CrackerMsg = true; deleteItem(CrackerID, CrackerSlot, playerItemsN[CrackerSlot]); if (misc.random(2) == 1) { addItem(1038 + misc.random(10),1); sendMessage("And you get the crackers item."); } else { sendMessage("but you didn't get the crackers item."); PlayerHandler.players[UsedOn].CrackerForMe = true; } } break;*/[/code]

item.title: Would this work foor pi?
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I hope that doesn’t work… that need some conventions right there.

item.title: Would this work foor pi?
item.dc:creator: @sonsofgod2 sonsofgod2
item.description:
@sonsofgod2 wrote:

ok trying to get christmas cracker working to give random colour p hat to either player randomly.

pi
317

here are codes

/*case 14: //Use something on another player                                junk = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();        //only needed to get the cracker slot ! (remove = server crash !)                                junk2 = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndianA();        //only needed to get the cracker slot ! (remove = server crash !)                                junk3 = inStream.readUnsignedWordA();                //only needed to get the cracker slot ! (remove = server crash !)                                int CrackerSlot = inStream.readSignedWordBigEndian();                                int CrackerID = playerItems[CrackerSlot];                                CrackerID -= 1; //Only to fix the ID !                                if (CrackerID == 962) {                                            sendMessage("You crack the cracker...");                                        int UsedOn = (int)(misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 3, 1) / 1000);                                        PlayerHandler.players[UsedOn].CrackerMsg = true;                                        deleteItem(CrackerID, CrackerSlot, playerItemsN[CrackerSlot]);                                        if (misc.random(2) == 1) {                                               addItem(1038 + misc.random(10),1);          sendMessage("And you get the crackers item.");                                        } else {                                                sendMessage("but you didn't get the crackers item.");                                                PlayerHandler.players[UsedOn].CrackerForMe = true;                                        }                                }                                break;*/
